notesStmt.note: Incomplete. Lacuna after folios 1, 2, 6, 9, 54, 61, 81, 87, 107, 114, 125, 160, 162, 170, 174, 176. Leaves on guards.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Guide for the Perplexed by Maimonides in Judeo-Arabic.

collation.p: Quires of mostly 10 leaves each, originally marked by signatures at the beginning and at the end, and catchwords at the end (only partly preserved).

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script, unpunctuated, of the 15th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Maimonides. Dalalat Ul-Hairin. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2423.'
